title: Game ping
body: I don't think my internet connection has any problems right now, but my ping is higher than usual. I wanted to practice earlier but I kept having 180+ pings. I'm not sure what's the cause of this. I tried restarting our internet but the ping remained the same. Is there a server issue right now?

replies.body:
That would be due to undersea cable issues, see here for details:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/WvuaHG1z-2018-03-21-nz-players-increased-latency
what ISP do you guys using?\
me and friend have same issue, definitely server side.
